benchmark_details.name: Augmented Ranking Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: The paper presents a method for augmenting preference datasets for preference optimization in large language models and introduces a multi-response-based training method.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To produce a large-scale preference dataset for training large language models and improve their response quality based on human preferences.

data.source: Seed dataset consisting of human-labeled preference pairs and generated data from language models.
data.annotation: Automatically generated and labeled by language models.

methodology.calculation: The performance is calculated based on win rates against baseline models in instruction tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher win rates indicate better performance in following human instructions.
methodology.validation: Results validated through the AlpacaEval and MT-bench benchmarks.
